pullrequest.title: Fix a bug in updating the dataframe

content.raw:
Thanks for testing! The performance improvement is icing on the cake (36 times faster for your test code, wow!). 

I'm not able to reproduce in self-contained code, so I'm not sure to exactly what situation the bug applies. But if you revert lyse to before the fix, and try a save_value('x', [1, 2, 3]) from an analysis routine, that's where I get the exception.
content.html:
Thanks for testing! The performance improvement is icing on the cake (36 times faster for your test code, wow!).

I'm not able to reproduce in self-contained code, so I'm not sure to exactly what situation the bug applies. But if you revert lyse to before the fix, and try a save_value('x', [1, 2, 3]) from an analysis routine, that's where I get the exception.
